body: Hello, Quick question: Per image attached, what is wrong with the output colors appearance?  I am new (very new —first post) to GH & LB, already in love though...so thank you all for your hard work on these amazing tools! In more words, for some reason the image generated is producing a textured surface and gradient. Grid is set to 4 (meters) so it should not be the reason, any idea...perhaps something in rhino options I need to change...I am not sure.  Big Thanks!![](http://api.ning.com:80/files/PyPlrJLAwZdiCVnoGqNpmpmsIYvHutI6Xxkgdx9F3PovW4UausLSrbeCOrVDBnqOhAtSkJCFVdcSDkAhvMC2K16Fz7jMZgEV/sunlighthours.JPG)
